   19: %%
   20: -module(eunit_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   24: 	 app_test/1, appup_test/1, eunit_test/1, eunit_exact_test/1,
   25:          fixture_test/1, primitive_test/1, surefire_utf8_test/1,
   26:          surefire_latin_test/1, surefire_c0_test/1, surefire_ensure_dir_test/1,
   27:          stacktrace_at_timeout_test/1, scale_timeouts_test/1]).
   28: 
   29: %% Two eunit tests:
   30: -export([times_out_test_/0, times_out_default_test/0]).
   31: 
   32: -export([sample_gen/0]).
   33: 
   34: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   35: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   36: -define(TIMEOUT, 1000).
   37: 
   38: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   39: 
   40: all() ->
   41:     [app_test, appup_test, eunit_test, eunit_exact_test, primitive_test,
   42:      fixture_test, surefire_utf8_test, surefire_latin_test, surefire_c0_test,
   43:      surefire_ensure_dir_test, stacktrace_at_timeout_test,
   44:      scale_timeouts_test].
   45: 
   46: groups() ->
   47:     [].
   48: 
   49: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   50:     Config.
   51: 
   52: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   53:     ok.
   54: 
   55: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   56:     Config.
   57: 
   58: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   59:     Config.
   60: 
   61: app_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   62:     ok = test_server:app_test(eunit).
   63: 
   64: appup_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   65:     ok = test_server:appup_test(eunit).
   66: 
   67: eunit_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   68:     ok = file:set_cwd(code:lib_dir(eunit)),
   69:     ok = eunit:test(eunit).
   70: 
   71: eunit_exact_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   72:     ok = file:set_cwd(code:lib_dir(eunit)),
   73:     {ok, fib} = compile:file("./examples/fib.erl", [{outdir,"./examples/"}]),
   74:     TestPrimitive =
   75:         fun(Primitive, Expected) ->
   76:                 ok = eunit:test(Primitive,
   77:                                 [{report, {eunit_test_listener, [self()]}},
   78:                                  {exact_execution, true}]),
   79:                 check_test_results(Primitive, Expected)
   80:         end,
   81:     Primitives =
   82:         [
   83:          {[eunit, eunit_tests],
   84:           #{pass => 7, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
   85:          {{application, stdlib},
   86:           #{pass => 0, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
   87:          {{file, "./ebin/eunit.beam"},
   88:           #{pass => 0, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
   89:          {{file, "./ebin/eunit_tests.beam"},
   90:           #{pass => 7, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
   91:          {{dir, "./examples/"},
   92:           #{pass => 8, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
   93:          {{generator, fun() -> fun () -> ok end end},
   94:           #{pass => 1, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
   95:          {{generator, ?MODULE, sample_gen},
   96:           #{pass => 1, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
   97:          {{with, value, [fun(_V) -> ok end]},
   98:           #{pass => 1, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}}
   99:         ],
  100:     [TestPrimitive(P, E) || {P, E} <- Primitives],
  101:     ok.
  102: 
  103: 
  104: primitive_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  105:     ok = file:set_cwd(code:lib_dir(eunit)),
  106:     {ok, fib} = compile:file("./examples/fib.erl", [{outdir,"./examples/"}]),
  107:     TestPrimitive =
  108:         fun(Primitive, Expected) ->
  109:                 ok = eunit:test(Primitive,
  110:                                 [{report, {eunit_test_listener, [self()]}}]),
  111:                 check_test_results(Primitive, Expected),
  112:                 ok = eunit:test(Primitive,
  113:                                 [{report, {eunit_test_listener, [self()]}},
  114:                                 {exact_execution, false}]),
  115:                 check_test_results(Primitive, Expected)
  116:         end,
  117:     Primitives =
  118:         [
  119:          {[eunit, eunit_tests],
  120:           #{pass => 14, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
  121:          {{application, stdlib},
  122:           #{pass => 0, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
  123:          {{file, "./ebin/eunit.beam"},
  124:           #{pass => 7, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
  125:          {{file, "./ebin/eunit_tests.beam"},
  126:           #{pass => 7, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
  127:          {{dir, "./examples/"},
  128:           #{pass => 8, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
  129:          {{generator, fun() -> fun () -> ok end end},
  130:           #{pass => 1, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
  131:          {{generator, ?MODULE, sample_gen},
  132:           #{pass => 1, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}},
  133:          {{with, value, [fun(_V) -> ok end]},
  134:           #{pass => 1, fail => 0, skip => 0, cancel => 0}}
  135:         ],
  136:     [TestPrimitive(P, E) || {P, E} <- Primitives],
  137:     ok.
  138: 
  139: sample_gen() ->
  140:     fun () -> ok end.
  141: 
  142: fixture_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  143:     eunit:test({setup, fun() -> ok end, fun() -> fun() -> ok end end}),
  144:     eunit:test({setup, fun() -> ok end, [{module, eunit_tests}]}),
  145:     eunit:test({foreach, fun() -> ok end, [fun() -> ok end]}),
  146:     eunit:test({foreachx, fun(_A) -> ok end,
  147:                 [{1, fun(_A, _B) -> fun() -> a_test end end}]}),
  148:     ok.
  149: 
  150: check_test_results(Primitive, Expected) ->
  151:     receive
  152:         {test_report, TestReport} ->
  153:             case Expected == TestReport of
  154:                 true ->
  155:                     ok;
  156:                 _ ->
  157:                     ct:pal("~p Expected: ~w Received: ~w",
  158:                            [Primitive, Expected, TestReport]),
  159:                     ct:fail(unexpected_result)
  160:             end
  161:     after ?TIMEOUT ->
  162:             ct:fail(no_test_report_not_received)
  163:     end.
  164: 
  165: surefire_latin_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  166:     ok = file:set_cwd(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config, ".")),
  167: 	check_surefire(tlatin),
  168: 	ok.
  169: 
  170: surefire_utf8_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  171:     ok = file:set_cwd(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config, ".")),
  172: 	check_surefire(tutf8),
  173: 	ok.
  174: 
  175: surefire_c0_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  176:     ok = file:set_cwd(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config, ".")),
  177:     Chars = check_surefire(tc0),
  178:     %% Check that these characters were not stripped
  179:     true = lists:member($\n, Chars),
  180:     true = lists:member($\r, Chars),
  181:     true = lists:member($\t, Chars),
  182:     ok.
  183: 
  184: surefire_ensure_dir_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  185:     XMLDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "c1"),
  186:     ok = eunit:test(tc0, [{report,{eunit_surefire,[{dir,XMLDir}]}}]),
  187:     ok = file:del_dir_r(XMLDir).
  188: 
  189: stacktrace_at_timeout_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  190:     Chars = check_surefire(ttimesout),
  191:     case string:find(Chars, "in call from") of
  192:         nomatch ->
  193:             ct:pal("Surefire XML:~n~ts", [Chars]),
  194:             ct:fail(missing_stacktrace_in_surefire);
  195:         _ ->
  196:             ok
  197:     end.
  198: 
  199: check_surefire(Module) ->
  200: 	File = "TEST-"++atom_to_list(Module)++".xml",
  201: 	file:delete(File),
  202: 	% ignore test result, some fail on purpose
  203: 	eunit:test(Module, [{report,{eunit_surefire,[{dir,"."}]}}]),
  204: 	{ok, Bin} = file:read_file(File),
  205: 	Chars = unicode:characters_to_list(Bin, unicode),
  206: 	%% Check that unicode decoding succeeded
  207: 	[_|_] = Chars,
  208: 	%% Check that file is valid XML
  209: 	xmerl_scan:file(File),
  210: 	Chars.
  211: 
  212: scale_timeouts_test(_Config) ->
  213:     %% Scaling with integers
  214:     %% The times_out_test_ will timeout after 1 second.
  215:     %% Scale it up by a factor of 2 and check that at least 2s have passed.
  216:     Millis1 = run_eunit_test_that_times_out(times_out_test_,
  217:                                             [{scale_timeouts, 2}]),
  218:     ?assert(Millis1 >= 2000, #{duration => Millis1}),
  219:     ?assert(Millis1 <  5000, #{duration => Millis1}),
  220: 
  221:     %% Scaling with float: should get rounded
  222:     %% Scaling down should work too
  223:     Millis2 = run_eunit_test_that_times_out(times_out_test_,
  224:                                             [{scale_timeouts, 0.25}]),
  225:     ?assert(Millis2 >= 250, #{duration => Millis2}),
  226:     ?assert(Millis2 < 1000, #{duration => Millis2}),
  227: 
  228:     %% It should be possible to scale the default timeout as well
  229:     Millis3 = run_eunit_test_that_times_out(times_out_default_test,
  230:                                             [{scale_timeouts, 0.01}]),
  231:     ?assert(Millis3 > 0, #{duration => Millis3}),
  232:     ?assert(Millis3 < 1000, #{duration => Millis3}),
  233:     ok.
  234: 
  235: run_eunit_test_that_times_out(TestFn, Options) ->
  236:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
  237:     %% Expect error due to the timeout:
  238:     case lists:suffix("_test_", atom_to_list(TestFn)) of
  239:         true ->
  240:             error = eunit:test({generator, ?MODULE, TestFn}, Options);
  241:         false ->
  242:             error = eunit:test({?MODULE, TestFn}, Options)
  243:     end,
  244:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
  245:     T1 - T0.
  246: 
  247: %% an eunit test generator:
  248: times_out_test_() ->
  249:     {timeout, 1, % the fun should timeout after this many seconds
  250:      fun() -> timer:sleep(10_000) % long enough to cause a timeout
  251:      end}.
  252: 
  253: %% an eunit test:
  254: times_out_default_test() ->
  255:     %% The default timeout for an xyz_test/0 is 5s,
  256:     %% so this is long enough to cause a time out.
  257:     timer:sleep(20_000).
  258:
